subject: [Radiance-general] pcomb to clip specific colors
body:
Thanks for the quick response Greg!

I'm using a specific, specular reflective color on each facade
orientation of a building to better understand which curtain wall
orientation is contributing to direct solar reflections on the street
level. I'm trying to parse from each image in an annual, time lapse
series the resultant patterns of reflection on the street separately
for each orientation / color.

Running the script you sent I'm getting the following error:
is_yellow: undefined function

Thanks again,
Chris

Christian Humann ~ Associate
LOISOS + UBBELOHDE
